addon.title: Addon Server
addon.description: Make sure the Anylist addon is installed and properly configured

data_description.server_addr: Full fledged URL including scheme and port (Example: http://192.168.1.2:89453)

binary.title: Binary Server
binary.description: The server binary can be downloaded from https://github.com/kevdliu/hassio-addon-anylist/releases

error.addon_server_cannot_connect: Failed to connect to addon server
error.server_binary_wrong_permissions: Failed to fix server binary permissions

data_description.default_list: Default list is used when list name is otherwise not specified
data_description.refresh_interval: How often lists should be refreshed from Anylist
